name: Social and Healthy Action for Rural Empowerment
briefDescription: The organization has been granted Special Consultative status by United Nations ECOSOC since 2013.SHARE has been concerned with the cause of tribal, women, children and underprivileged section of the society. It has been implementing educational, environmental, agricultural, self-employment, social empowerment, health programme, micro finance, watershed development, and agricultural and other development and awareness generation activities in 70 remote and distant rural areas of East Singbhum, West Singhbhum and Seraikela-Kharsawaan districts of Jharkhand. The organization has constructed 211 waterbodies till now under holistic approach to watershed development.
